trans-unit.source: Specifies information specific to the time zone

seg-source.mrk: Specifies information specific to the time zone

target.mrk: Specifies information specific to the time zone

trans-unit.source: The current bias for local time translation on this computer, in minutes

seg-source.mrk: The current bias for local time translation on this computer, in minutes

target.mrk: The current bias for local time translation on this computer, in minutes

trans-unit.source: A SYSTEMTIME structure that contains a date and local time when the transition from daylight saving time to standard time occurs on this operating system.

seg-source.mrk: A SYSTEMTIME structure that contains a date and local time when the transition from daylight saving time to standard time occurs on this operating system.

target.mrk: A SYSTEMTIME structure that contains a date and local time when the transition from daylight saving time to standard time occurs on this operating system.

trans-unit.source: The bias value to be used during local time translations that occur during standard time

seg-source.mrk: The bias value to be used during local time translations that occur during standard time

target.mrk: The bias value to be used during local time translations that occur during standard time

trans-unit.source: A description for daylight saving time

seg-source.mrk: A description for daylight saving time

target.mrk: A description for daylight saving time

trans-unit.source: A SYSTEMTIME structure that contains a date and local time when the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs on this operating system.

seg-source.mrk: A SYSTEMTIME structure that contains a date and local time when the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs on this operating system.

target.mrk: A SYSTEMTIME structure that contains a date and local time when the transition from standard time to daylight saving time occurs on this operating system.

trans-unit.source: The bias value to be used during local time translations that occur during daylight saving time

seg-source.mrk: The bias value to be used during local time translations that occur during daylight saving time

target.mrk: The bias value to be used during local time translations that occur during daylight saving time
